sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react' import logo from '../../assets/logo.png' import logoSearch from '../../assets/icon-search.png' import icon from '../../assets/icon-sample.png' import styles from './UserArea.style' import { StyleRoot } from 'radium' import { NavLink, useLocation } from "react-router-dom"; const Header = () => { const [isActive, setIsActive] = useState(false) return (
setIsActive(!isActive)} key="img" style={isActive ? styles().imgIconActive : styles().imgIcon} src={icon} alt="Sign in logo"/>
) } export default Header
